snippet: David Eisenhauer, a freshman charged with abduction and murder, knew the victim, who had been missing since Wednesday, according to investigators.
abstract: Virginia Tech students Natalie M Keepers and David Eisenhauer face charges in connection to the abduction and murder of 13-year-old Nicole Madison Lovell; both have been arrested while police investigate motive and nature of relationship between Eisenhauer and Lovell.
lead_paragraph: David Eisenhauer, a freshman charged with abduction and murder, knew the victim, who had been missing since Wednesday, according to investigators.

headline.main: Two Virginia Tech Students Arrested in Girl’s Death
headline.print_headline: 2 Virginia Tech Students Are Charged in Killing of 13-Year-Old Girl

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
